title: Nestable blueprints
raw_output:
{'files_to_modify': ['src/flask/blueprints.py', 'src/flask/app.py', 'tests/test_blueprints.py', 'docs/blueprints.rst'], 'reasoning': "1. src/flask/blueprints.py: The core of the feature must be implemented here—in the Blueprint class, adding the register_blueprint method and logic to handle 'sub-blueprints'.
2. src/flask/app.py: The Flask app's logic for registering blueprints needs to integrate with support for recursive/nested blueprints, so changes may be required to work with the new deferred registration or to recursively process sub-blueprints.
3. tests/test_blueprints.py: Existing and new tests must cover nested blueprint registration and the correct propagation of url_prefix and options.
4. docs/blueprints.rst: The blueprint documentation should be updated to explain and exemplify the use of nested/sub-blueprints and related API changes."}
